name: C++ Downloader Class
tagline: C++ 11 Multi-thread Http Download Class using libcurl
body:
# C++ Downloader

Downloader contains Core and MacGUI two components for now.

*MIT License*

## Core

Core Downloader is smart and convinient http download classes written in C++ 11 using libcurl.

It's easy to use and good for Mobile platforms as well.

## MacGUI

Shell for MacOS. (under construction)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
